metadata.name: DexScreener
metadata.description: Real-time DEX analytics across 90+ chains and 500+ DEXs. Track token prices, liquidity, volume, and new pair listings. Essential for ICM launch monitoring.
metadata.author: gICM

tools.name: getTokenPairs
tools.description: Get all trading pairs for a token across all DEXs

tools.name: searchPairs
tools.description: Search pairs by token address, symbol, or name

tools.name: getLatestPairs
tools.description: Get newest token pairs (perfect for ICM launch detection)

tools.name: getTokenProfile
tools.description: Get token metadata, socials, and description

tools.name: getPairMetrics
tools.description: Get detailed metrics: price, volume, liquidity, price changes

tools.name: getTopGainers
tools.description: Track trending tokens and top gainers

tools.name: getNewListings
tools.description: Monitor new token launches in real-time

tools.name: trackLiquidity
tools.description: Monitor liquidity changes for rug detection

pricing.note: Pro tier includes historical data and advanced filters

steps: No API key needed for basic tier (300 req/min)
For Pro: Sign up and get API key from dashboard
Add DEXSCREENER_API_KEY to .env (optional for free tier)
